seo.description: Welcome to Ace Casino Airport — a modern casino near Calgary International Airport. Enjoy over 600 slot machines, poker room, VIP lounges, restaurants, live shows, and generous bonuses. The perfect destination for gaming and entertainment.

history.title: About Ace Casino Airport
history.description2: Ace Casino Airport is a modern casino located near Calgary International Airport. It offers a wide range of slot machines, table games, and poker tournaments. Guests can enjoy VIP areas, stylish bars, and restaurants. The casino is known for its comfortable atmosphere and excellent service. Promotions and bonus offers are held regularly. Its convenient location and free parking make it popular with travelers. It’s a great spot for entertainment and gaming fun.

customHtml.title: luxury and excitement near the airport
customHtml.description:
Ace Casino Airport is a modern entertainment destination located just minutes from Calgary International Airport. It offers guests a unique blend of gaming, dining, and stylish relaxation. Spacious gaming halls, VIP salons, and a dedicated poker room create a welcoming atmosphere for players of all levels.


The venue features three dining options: The Kitchen, The Buffet, and the ACE Sports Bar, which boasts a massive 40-foot TV wall. Guests can enjoy Canadian and international cuisine, sip drinks at the central bar, or relax in the cozy vibe of a neighborhood pub. A nightly buffet and daily specials add extra flavor to the experience.


For those wishing to stay nearby, the Clique Hotel is located just steps away from the casino, making it ideal for travelers and short-term visitors. The casino also offers over 800 parking spaces, ensuring easy access for everyone.


Ace Casino Airport hosts regular events, tournaments, and giveaways, including slot competitions, poker promotions, and themed nights. The Pulse Arena, Alberta’s only private electronic table game lounge, features interactive games like electronic blackjack, roulette, and baccarat.


Bonus programs include welcome offers, progressive jackpots, and exclusive promotions for loyal guests. The loyalty program allows players to earn points, enjoy complimentary drinks and meals, and receive invitations to private events. A GameSense Advisor is also available on-site to support responsible gaming practices.


How to Prepare for Your Visit to Ace Casino Airport

Visiting Ace Casino Airport is not just about gaming — it’s about enjoying a refined and welcoming atmosphere. The casino follows specific rules to ensure safety, respect, and a pleasant experience for all guests. Knowing the basic requirements before your visit will help you feel confident and avoid any issues.


General Entry Conditions

  • • Entry is allowed only for adults (18+).
  • • Intoxicated individuals will be denied entry.
  • • ID may be required at the entrance.
  • • Weapons, large bags, and outside drinks are prohibited.

Dress Code

  • • Elegant or semi-formal attire is preferred.
  • • Men are encouraged to wear shirts, trousers, and dress shoes; suits are welcome.
  • • Women should opt for dresses, skirts, stylish blouses, and closed-toe shoes.
  • • Sportswear, beachwear, dirty or torn clothing are not allowed.
  • • Sneakers are acceptable only if clean and from premium brands.

Behavior and Etiquette

  • • Respect other guests and staff.
  • • Avoid commenting on others’ bets or moves.
  • • Keep noise levels low in gaming areas.
  • • No photography or video recording without permission.

Following these guidelines helps maintain a comfortable, fair, and high-quality environment. The casino values its guests and strives to offer the best possible experience.


ACE Rewards Loyalty Program — Play More, Earn More

The ACE Rewards loyalty program is designed to reward regular guests and enhance their casino experience. Members earn points for gaming, dining, and participating in events, which can be redeemed for prizes, free play, and exclusive offers. The program is open to all adult visitors, and registration takes just a few minutes.


The more you play, the higher your tier and the greater your benefits. Tier levels unlock personalized bonuses, VIP events, and priority services. Members also receive invitations to private promotions, giveaways, and special tournaments.


Key benefits of ACE Rewards

  • • Earn points for every bet and purchase
  • • Redeem points for free games, meals, and gifts
  • • Access exclusive promotions and VIP events
  • • Receive personalized offers and bonuses
  • • Enjoy faster service and priority entry

Bonus examples

  • • 150% bonus on first purchase
  • • Up to 417,500 GC + 202 SC in special promotions
  • • Free spins and credits for active play

Program tiers

  • • Basic — standard bonuses and point accumulation
  • • Silver — increased point rates, dining discounts
  • • Gold — personalized offers, free event tickets
  • • Platinum — VIP service, exclusive tournaments, priority access

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Ace Casino Airport
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses and Special Offers at Ace Casino Airport

Ace Casino Airport offers more than just games — it delivers a full entertainment experience with generous bonuses, exciting promotions, and seasonal events. Guests can participate in tournaments, themed parties, and giveaways that offer valuable prizes ranging from tech gadgets to travel packages. These offers cover slot machines, table games, and even dining experiences.


Seasonal promotions are often tied to holidays, casino anniversaries, or major sports events. Participation is usually free for registered guests using the Winner’s Edge card. New players receive welcome bonuses, while regular visitors enjoy daily and weekly rewards.


Examples of bonuses and offers

  • • Sign-up bonus: 7,500 Gold Coins + 2.5 Sweepstakes Coins
  • • Welcome package: up to 57,500 GC + 27.5 SC on first purchase
  • • Slot tournaments: prizes up to 1,000 CAD and gift cards
  • • Pick Your Package: win Apple & Samsung bundles, travel vouchers, hotel stays, and gift cards worth up to 3,000 CAD
  • • Seasonal events: Halloween Party, Carnival Birthday, Mo’ Mummy — with raffles, shows, and treats
  • • Suite Tickets Experience: win VIP suite tickets to hockey games
  • • Participation rewards: free dinners, gaming credits, and buffet access

These offers are available to both new and returning guests, making every visit to Ace Casino Airport not just thrilling, but rewarding.


Games Guests Love at Ace Casino Airport

Ace Casino Airport offers a wide variety of games for both casual players and seasoned gamblers. With over 600 slot machines, dozens of table games, a modern poker room, and Alberta’s only private electronic gaming lounge, the casino delivers a dynamic and immersive experience. Progressive slots and side bets on table games add excitement and increase the chances of big wins.


The poker room operates 24/7 and features both cash games and tournaments with varying buy-ins. The Pulse Arena provides a digital twist on classic table games in a lively, club-like atmosphere. VIP salons offer high-limit tables and private service for elite players.


Popular Slot Machines

  • • American Original, Alberta Gold, Jackpot Junction, Diamond Millions — progressive jackpots
  • • Themes range from classic fruit to fantasy and adventure
  • • Bets from $0.01 to $5

Poker

  • • NLH, PLO, PLO8 — cash games and tournaments
  • • Bad Beat Jackpot, Best Hand Promo, free dinners on Fridays and Saturdays
  • • Dedicated poker entrance and VIP lounge

Table Games

  • • Blackjack — with Lucky Lucky and Buster Blackjack side bets
  • • EZ-Baccarat — with Dragon 7 and Panda 8
  • • Roulette — classic and electronic formats
  • • Ultimate Texas Hold’Em — with progressive options

Electronic Games (Pulse Arena)

  • • Blackjack, Craps, Roulette, Baccarat — digital format
  • • Club-like vibe with music and lighting

Minimum and Maximum Bets at Ace Casino Airport

Ace Casino Airport offers flexible betting options for players of all levels. Whether you prefer low-stakes slots or high-limit tables in VIP areas, the casino ensures an inclusive and thrilling experience for everyone.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines $0.01 CAD $5 CAD
Roulette $1 CAD $1,000 CAD
Blackjack $5 CAD $500 CAD
Baccarat $10 CAD $1,000 CAD
Ultimate Texas Hold’Em $5 CAD $500 CAD
Poker (NLH, PLO) Buy-in from $100 Buy-in up to $5,000

Entertainment and Shows at Ace Casino Airport

Ace Casino Airport is more than just a gaming venue — it’s a full-scale entertainment hub where guests can enjoy vibrant events, themed parties, and spectacular shows. The casino hosts live music nights, DJ performances, and special promotions tied to holidays and major sports events. Nightlife is a key feature, with lounge areas and bars offering a club-like atmosphere complete with music, cocktails, and dancing.


Regular entertainment includes slot tournaments, poker promotions, and prize giveaways held weekly. Seasonal events range from Halloween parties to festive New Year celebrations. Sports fans can watch live games on the massive 40-foot TV wall at ACE Sports Bar, while those seeking nightlife can enjoy evening programs with music and social vibes.


Ace Casino Airport also features unique show programs and special offers like “Pick Your Package,” where guests can win gadgets, travel experiences, and gift cards. Every event comes with bonuses and rewards, making the experience both exciting and rewarding.


Main entertainment and events

  • • Themed parties — Halloween, Christmas, Casino Birthday with shows and contests
  • • Live music and DJ sets — in lounges and bars
  • • Slot tournaments — with cash prizes and gift cards
  • • Poker promotions — Bad Beat Jackpot, Best Hand Promo, free dinners for players
  • • Pick Your Package — win gadgets, travel packages, and gift cards
  • • Sports broadcasts — on a 40-foot TV wall at ACE Sports Bar
  • • Night programs — cocktails, dancing, and club vibes

Relax and Dine at Ace Casino Airport: Food, Comfort, and Style

Ace Casino Airport is not just a gaming destination — it’s a full-service entertainment complex offering dining, relaxation, and hospitality. The casino features three main venues: The Kitchen, The Buffet, and the ACE Sports Bar, each with its own vibe and menu. Guests can enjoy Canadian, Asian, and international cuisine, along with daily specials like Happy Hour and themed dinners.


The Buffet delights visitors with nightly themes — from Indian Mondays to Italian Saturdays. At ACE Sports Bar, guests can enjoy great food while watching live sports on a massive TV wall, including UFC and hockey. The Center Bar serves cocktails, beer, and wine at special prices, especially during evening hours. For private events, the casino offers a Social Room that can be customized for banquets, parties, or meetings.


For overnight stays, the Clique Hotel is located just steps away from the casino. Nearby hotels such as Best Western Plus, Hotel Blackfoot, and Comfort Inn & Suites offer comfortable accommodations with breakfast, pools, and free parking.


Dining and relaxation venues

  • • The Kitchen — Canadian and Chinese cuisine restaurant
  • • The Buffet — themed dinners: BBQ, Prime Rib, Asian Night, etc.
  • • ACE Sports Bar — sports broadcasts, snacks, cocktails, Happy Hour
  • • Center Bar — drinks, wine, beer, evening specials
  • • Clique Hotel — hotel next to the casino, ideal for guests
  • • Best Western, Hotel Blackfoot, Comfort Inn — hotels within 1.5 km
  • • Social Room — rental space for banquets, parties, private events

items.title: What languages are supported?
items.answer: English is the main language. Staff also speak French and others.

items.title: Can I pay with cash?
items.answer: Yes, cash, credit/debit cards, and digital payments are accepted.

items.title: Do I need to register to play?
items.answer: No, registration is optional but unlocks bonuses and loyalty perks.

items.title: Is there an entry fee?
items.answer: No, entry to the casino is free.
